metadata.name: HUXLEY Humans #1
metadata.description:
HUXLEY Humans are a generative collection of 3000 Citizens from Fury-7, located in Sector-217 in the HUXLEY Universe. 10 Colonies of Humans represent different visual styles through the collection.

HUXLEY Humans can only be minted with a Genesis Token. Join the hunt at huxleysaga.com.

HUXLEY Humans are granted certain personal and commercial use licenses, found in the metadata.
